product_name: Alite Boa Lite Dog Collar - 2013 Closeout
long_description: The Alite Boa Lite Dog Collar is comfy, lightweight, quick-drying and adjustable for the perfect fit. It's everything your furry friend wants whether he's snoozing or going bonkers at the park. Includes a built-in pocket that's great for holding dog treats or an emergency waste bag. Durable ripstop nylon fabric is quick-to-dry and machine washable. Medium fits 12 - 16 in. necks; Large fits 16 - 24 in. necks. Closeout.
short_description: The Alite Boa Lite Dog Collar is comfy, lightweight, quick-drying and adjustable for the perfect fit. It's everything your furry friend wants whether he's snoozing or going bonkers at the park.
